title: Professional Care Behavior Competency Enhancement Program for Pharmaceutical Managers

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Knowledge in Medication Management and Basic Patient Counseling Competencies
context.additional_context: Case-based mobile learning course for pharmaceutical/ hospital managers to improve patient-centered care behaviors, structured in 15-minute modules within a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: Learners can identify professional caring behavior elements in patient case scenarios with at least 80% accuracy
Learners can apply at least three professional caring skills (empathic listening, situational judgment, therapeutic communication) in simulated patient counseling role-plays
Learners can achieve at least a 15% score improvement in the Professional Caring Behaviour Survey (PCBS) compared to baseline
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
